summary: A recently jailed petty thief disguises as a Mullah and succeeds in escaping; but has to stay in the Mullah' role longer than he expected to.
cast: Parviz Parastui|Bahram Ebrahimi|Shahrokh Foroutanian|Farideh Sepah Mansour|Maedeh Tahmasebi|Ali Kooshesh|Alireza Abbasi|Ali Abedini|Ra'na Azadivar|Amirhosein Gholami Ebtekar|Hamidrezashakeri|Auri Hauccani|Cyrus Hemati|Atefeh Khobani|Mh6ti|Reza Mirzaei|Farzin Mohades|Mehran Rajabi|Soheyla Razavi|Sepehr Rezanoor|Reza Saeedi|Amin Salahloo|Naqi Seif-Jamali|Hossein Soleimani|Rastin Soleimani|Mehran Tirdad|Bardia Zadeh
title: Marmoulak
